content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Dogra

Written by Manu Rishi Chadha. Rajeev Kaul. Manu Rishi Chadha. Meghvrat Singh Gurjar. Meghvrat Singh

Cast Govinda (Gagan). Digangana Suryavanshi (Bindu). Varun Sharma (Rajiv Chabbra). Sanjay Mishra (Manchanda). Rajesh Sharma (Ranpal). Prabhleen Sandhu (Bela) . Anil (Peon). Pratik Asnani (Bindu’s Friend’s Husband). Habib Azmi (Javed Akhtar). Ashmita Kaur Bakshi (Sonam). Manoj Bakshi (Boss). Srestha Banerjee (Polio girl 1). Shikha Dogra (Anchor). Brijendra Kala (Chor). Swati Kaushik (Jodha). Ishtiyak Khan (Sunny). Kajal Khanchandani (Shabana Azmi). Atul Mathur (Akbar). Vinay Mhatre (Durban 2). Biren Mohanty (Constable 2). Subroto Mukherjee (Durban 1). Alika Nair (Secretary at Purifier). Bachan Pachehra (Play Director). Raj Parmar (Young Boy). Shivaanii Rai (Anarkali (as Shivani Rai)). Nitinn Rana (Constable 1 (as Nitin Rana)). Sidhai Rane (Polio Girl 2). Madhusudan Reddy (Director’s Assistant). Nikhil Sahni (Romeo Man (as Nikhil Sawhney)). Dinesh Sharma (Mastan). Madhur Mohan Sharma (Courier Boy). Manju Sharma (Maid). Shreshtha (Polio Girl 1). Sushil Shukla (Abbas). Meghvrat Singh (Sameer). Poonam Singh (Young Girl). Natasa Stankovic (Dancer in the song ‘Jimmy Choo’). Tanu (Bindu’s Friend)

Language Hindi

Producers Bhanu Bhaskar. Ravindra Mankame. Sajid Qureshi. Mahipal Karan Rathore. Salaunddin Yousuf

Production Inbox Pictures Pvt Lt. PVR Picture
